humanum_full_description_en:
Elaboration: The first essay is " Song ", which looks like a man who stretches out his hands to plant vegetation. After " shame on" filling " the Cottage next", " Ji " in the " dead " (or " female ") further falsely for like " cloud " of the form (see " shame " word in the Eastern Han Dynasty <Chinese Liyang long Pan cadre "Official Stele"), then evolved into " art ". Later multi-purpose " Art " instead of " shame ", " handiness ."

The original meaning of " art " is planting. Such as "Yi Zhou Shu. "Lai Kuang": "For Yu Zi to work art, the palace and city walls are prepared for repairs, and there are fine dishes, so the day is full." Kong Chao's note: "Art, trees." "Mencius. "Teng Wen Gong 1": "Hou Ji teaches the people to harvest crops and cultivate five grains; when the five grains are mature, the people are nurtured." Zhao Qi's note: "Art, breeding."

" Art " means skill and talent. Such as "Tsinghua One. "Jin Fei" Jane 4: "Not if Dan (Dan) is also a year (Ning), Ruo Cheng (smart) can, many [talents] (talent), many sages (art), capable things [鬼示] (鬼) God." This "Shang Shu. "Jin Yu": "Yuren is capable of examination, versatile and capable of doing ghosts and gods." Another example is "Huainanzi. "Annotation": "It's not the right way. Although there are many skills, they are not beneficial."

" Art " also specifically refers to the six subjects used to educate students in ancient times, including ritual, music, archery, imperialism, calligraphy, and number. Such as "The Analects. "Survey": "Aspiration to Tao, to virtue, to benevolence, to enjoy art." He Yan's collection of explanations: "Art, six arts." "Zhou Li. Land official. Da Situ: "Three refers to six arts, ritual, music, shooting, imperialism, book, and number."

" Art " also expresses standards. Such as "Zuo Zhuan. "The Twenty Years of Zhaogong": "Clothing is often without art, and there is no degree of restraint; the palace is changing day by day, and lewdness is not violated." Du's note: "Art, the rule of law." It also means the limit. Such as "Mandarin. "Jin Yu": "Jihuanzi is arrogant and extravagant, but greedy and has no art." Wei Zhao's note: "Art, greatness."
humanum_short_description_en: Synopsis: The first essay "埶", like a person who stretches out his hands to plant vegetation. After " shame on" filling " the Cottage next", " Ji under" " stop " (or " female ") as further falsely for " cloud " of the shape, then evolved into " Art ." The original meaning is planting.
humanum_full_description:
初文作「埶」，象人伸出雙手栽種草木之形。後在「埶」上加注「艸」旁，「丮」下的「止」（或「女」）又進一步訛為象「云」之形（參見「埶」字在東漢〈漢溧陽長潘乾校官碑〉的寫法），遂演變成「藝」。後世多用「藝」而不用「埶」、「蓺」。

　　「藝」的本義是種植。如《逸周書．糴匡》：「供餘子務藝，宮室城廓修為備，供有嘉菜，於是日滿。」孔晁注：「藝，樹也。」《孟子．滕文公上》：「后稷教民稼穡，樹藝五穀；五穀熟而民人育。」趙岐注：「藝，殖也。」

　　「藝」表示技能、才藝。如《清華壹．金縢》簡4：「不若但（旦）也，是年（佞）若丂（巧）能，多[才心]（才）多埶（藝），能事[鬼示]（鬼）神。」今本《尚書．金縢》：「予仁若考能，多材多藝，能事鬼神。」又如《淮南子．詮言》：「不得其道，伎藝雖多，未有益也。」

　　「藝」也特指古代教育學生的六個科目，包括禮、樂、射、御、書、數。如《論語．述而》：「志於道，據於德，依於仁，遊於藝。」何晏集解：「藝，六藝也。」《周禮．地官．大司徒》：「三曰六藝，禮、樂、射、御、書、數。」

　　「藝」還表示準則。如《左傳．昭公二十年》：「布常無藝，徵斂無度；宮室日更，淫樂不違。」杜預注：「藝，法制也。」又表示極限。如《國語．晉語》：「及桓子驕泰奢侈，貪慾無藝。」韋昭注：「藝，極也。」
humanum_short_description: 初文作「埶」，象人伸出雙手栽種草木之形。後在「埶」上加注「艸」旁，「丮」下的「止」（或「女」）又進一步訛為象「云」之形，遂演變成「藝」。本義是種植。

①才能，技能，技術：工藝。技藝。文藝。藝人。藝術(ａ．戲劇、曲藝、音樂、美術、建築、舞蹈、電影、詩和文學等的總稱；b．指富有創造性的方式、方法；c．形狀獨特而美觀的)。藝苑奇葩。藝高人膽大。
②種植：園藝。
③準則、法度、限度：“驕泰奢侈，貪慾無藝。”

Chinese: The rice seedlings always use different techniques to find the best one.

Kind: traditional

初文作「 埶 」，象人伸出雙手栽種草木之形。後在「 埶 」上加注「 艸 」旁，「 丮 」下的「 止 」（或「 女 」）又進一步訛為象「 云 」之形（參見「 埶 」字在東漢〈漢溧陽長潘乾校官碑〉的寫法），遂演變成「 藝 」。後世多用「 藝 」而不用「 埶 」、「 蓺 」。 「 藝 」的本義是種植。如《逸周書．糴匡》：「供餘子務藝，宮室城廓修為備，供有嘉菜，於是日滿。」孔晁注：「藝，樹也。」《孟子．滕文公上》：「后稷教民稼穡，樹藝五穀；五穀熟而民人育。」趙岐注：「藝，殖也。」 「 藝 」表示技能、才藝。如《清華壹．金縢》簡4：「不若但（旦）也，是年（佞）若丂（巧）能，多[才心]（才）多埶（藝），能事[鬼示]（鬼）神。」今本《尚書．金縢》：「予仁若考能，多材多藝，能事鬼神。」又如《淮南子．詮言》：「不得其道，伎藝雖多，未有益也。」 「 藝 」也特指古代教育學生的六個科目，包括禮、樂、射、御、書、數。如《論語．述而》：「志於道，據於德，依於仁，遊於藝。」何晏集解：「藝，六藝也。」《周禮．地官．大司徒》：「三曰六藝，禮、樂、射、御、書、數。」 「 藝 」還表示準則。如《左傳．昭公二十年》：「布常無藝，徵斂無度；宮室日更，淫樂不違。」杜預注：「藝，法制也。」又表示極限。如《國語．晉語》：「及桓子驕泰奢侈，貪慾無藝。」韋昭注：「藝，極也。」
Elaboration: The first essay is " Song", which looks like a man who stretches out his hands to plant vegetation. After " shame on" filling " the Cottage next", " Ji" in the " dead" (or " female") further falsely for like " cloud" of the form (see " shame" word in the Eastern Han Dynasty art". Later multi-purpose " Art" instead of " shame", " handiness." The original meaning of " art" is planting. Such as "Yi Zhou Shu. "Lai Kuang": "For Yu Zi to work art, the palace and city walls are prepared for repairs, and there are fine dishes, so the day is full." Kong Chao's note: "Art, trees." "Mencius. "Teng Wen Gong 1": "Hou Ji teaches the people to harvest crops and cultivate five grains; when the five grains are mature, the people are nurtured." Zhao Qi's note: "Art, breeding." " Art" means skill and talent. Such as "Tsinghua One. "Jin Fei" Jane 4: "Not if Dan (Dan) is also a year (Ning), Ruo Cheng (smart) can, many [talents] (talent), many sages (art), capable things [鬼示] (鬼) God." This "Shang Shu. "Jin Yu": "Yuren is capable of examination, versatile and capable of doing ghosts and gods." Another example is "Huainanzi. "Annotation": "It's not the right way. Although there are many skills, they are not beneficial." " Art" also specifically refers to the six subjects used to educate students in ancient times, including ritual, music, archery, imperialism, calligraphy, and number. Such as "The Analects. "Survey": "Aspiration to Tao, to virtue, to benevolence, to enjoy art." He Yan's collection of explanations: "Art, six arts." "Zhou Li. Land official. Da Situ: "Three refers to six arts, ritual, music, shooting, imperialism, book, and number." " Art" also expresses standards. Such as "Zuo Zhuan. "The Twenty Years of Zhaogong": "Clothing is often without art, and there is no degree of restraint; the palace is changing day by day, and lewdness is not violated." Du's note: "Art, the rule of law." It also means the limit. Such as "Mandarin. "Jin Yu": "Jihuanzi is arrogant and extravagant, but greedy and has no art." Wei Zhao's note: "Art, greatness."

藝字的基本解释

藝
yì
见“艺”。

藝字的汉语字典释义

[①]［yì］
［《廣韻》魚祭切，去祭，疑。］
亦作“兿1”。亦作“埶1”。亦作“秇1”。亦作“萟1”。亦作“蓺1”。“艺1”的繁体字。
(1)种植。
(2)技艺；才能。
(3)指礼、乐、射、御、书、数六种古代教学科目。
(4)指经籍。
(5)艺术；文学。
(6)区分。
(7)射击的目标。
(8)准则；限度。

藝字的康熙字典解释

【申集上】【艸字部】　藝； 康熙笔画：21； 页码：页1065第34
〔古文〕秇【唐韻】魚祭切【韻會】倪祭切，?音蓺。才能也。【禮·禮運】月以爲量，故功有藝也。【註】藝猶才也。　又【周禮·天官·宮正】會其什伍，而敎之道藝。【註】藝謂禮、樂、射、御、書、數。　又【書·舜典】歸，格于藝祖。【傳】告至文祖之廟。藝，文也。又【王延壽·魯靈光殿賦】觀藝於魯。【註】六經也。　又【左傳·文六年】陳之藝極。【註】藝，準也。【司馬相如·上林賦】藝殪仆。【註】所射準的爲藝。　又【家語】合諸侯而藝貢事禮也。【註】藝，分別貢獻之事也。　又【晉語】貪欲無藝。【註】藝，極也。　又姓。【通志·氏族略】有藝氏。　又與蓺通。【韻會】種也。【書·禹貢】蒙羽其藝。【傳】兩山巳可種藝。【孟子】樹藝五穀。　又【韻補】五結切，叶音臬。【丘遲·思賢賦】備百行之高致，談九流之洪藝。諒可雜而非染，跡每同而常別。

考證：〔【書·舜典】歸格于藝祖。【傳】告止文祖之廟。〕　謹照原文告止改告至。

藝字的起名意思

暂无。

Chinese dictionary definition of words
[①]［yì］
["Guangyun" fish sacrifice cut, go to sacrifice, doubt. ]
Also known as "兿1". Also known as "埶1". Also known as "Sui 1". Also known as "萟1". Also known as "蓺1". Traditional characters for "艺1".
(1) Planting.
(2) Skill; talent.
(3) Refers to six ancient teaching subjects of ritual, music, shooting, imperialism, calligraphy, and counting.
(4) Refers to Jingji.
(5) Art; Literature.
(6) Distinguish.
(7) The target of shooting.
(8) Criteria; Limits.

[Shen Ji 1] [Department of Characters] 　yi; Kangxi Strokes: 21; Page Number: Page 1065 Page 34
[Ancient text] Sui [Tang Yun] Fish Festival Cut [Yunhui] Ni Ji cut,? Yin Ling. Talent too. 【Rite·Rite Luck】Monthly counts, so merit has art. [Note] Art is still talented.　[Zhou Li·Tian Guan·Gong Zheng] knows all about it, and teaches Taoism and art. [Note] Art means ritual, music, shooting, imperial, book, and number.　[Book·Shun Dian] return again, is in the style of Yi Zu. [Biography] Report to the Temple of Wenzu. Art and culture. Also 【Wang Yanshou·Lu Lingguang Palace Fu】Appreciation of art in Lu. [Note] The Six Classics are also.　[Zuo Zhuan·Wen Six Years] Chen Zhiyiji. [Note] Art, quasi. 【Sima Xiangru·Shanglin Fu】Yi Xiaopu. [Note] The shot is art.　[Family Language] Together with the princes and art tribute. [Note] Art is also a matter of contribution.　[Jin dialect] Greedy and unartistic. [Note] Art, extremely.　Another last name. 【Tongzhi·Clan Brief】There is a Yi clan.　Connect with Ling again. [Rhyme Club] Kind of. 【Book·Yugong】Meng Yu Qi Yi. [Biography] The two mountains can cultivate art. [Mencius] Tree Art and Five Grains.　[Rhyme Filling] Five knots cut, Ye Yinjian. 【Qiu Chi·Sixian Fu】Prepare a hundred lines of nobleness, and talk about the great art of the nine streams. Forgiveness can be miscellaneous rather than dyed, and the traces are always the same but often different. Textual research: [[Book·Shundian] attributed to Yizu.
